None.Name: Blessed Backup
None.Description: Activate to become immobile and absorb all damage done to the targeted friendly unit. The absorbed damage is transferred to all own stonekin within a 40m radius of the target. The transferred damage can not be warded off by damage reducing abilities. Lasts for 30 seconds or until interrupted. Reusable every 30 seconds.
